import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { resizeEvent } from './pages/utils' import useAxiosPrivate from './hooks/useAxiosPrivate' import useAuth from '../hooks/useAuth' import Login from './pages/Login' import PersistLogin from './pages/PersistLogin' import Registration from './pages/Registration' import CreateGame from './pages/CreateGame' import EnterNames from './pages/EnterNames' import SelectSession from './pages/SelectSession' import SessionPreview from './pages/SessionPreview' import Game from './pages/Game' import EndScreen from './pages/EndScreen' import { useEffect } from 'react' function App() { const { setAuth } = useAuth() const axiosPrivate = useAxiosPrivate() const navigate = useNavigate() useEffect(() => { resizeEvent() window.addEventListener('resize', resizeEvent) return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', resizeEvent) } }, []) const logout = () => { axiosPrivate.delete('/logout').then((res) => { if(res.status === 204) { setAuth({ accessToken: '' }) navigate('/login', { replace: true }) } }) } return (
{/* 'Public' routes --> routes that can be accessed without token */} } /> } /> } /> {/* routes that have to be protected by a token PersistLogin is needed, so that the user doesn't have to login after page refresh */} }> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } />
) } export default App
